name: Lifesaver
description: When it comes to both its candy-like taste and ability to knock out chronic pain, Lifesaver definitely lives up to its name. This indica-dominant cross of the breeder strains BOG Bubble and Subcool JCB was created to meet the special demands of pain sufferers. Relaxing with a grape and bubble gum aroma, this strain is worth a try for those looking for a stronger, medicated feeling. Lifesaver flowers quickly, usually within 8 weeks.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Tingly, Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Pain, Spasticity, Stress, Cramps, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
